description: Delivery of prefabricated commercial and industrial buildings
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Shelter Project

**Project Reference**: WS4435718502
**Title**: Design, Fabrication, Construction, and Delivery of Shelters

**Status**: Expired Tender (Note: This announcement has been superseded by a new tender, and bidders are advised to check the relevant Government of Canada website for the current information.)

**Publication Date**: February 8, 2024
**Closing Date**: March 20, 2024

**Amendment Date**: March 18, 2024

**Contract Period**: Expected start date: May 15, 2024; Expected end date: May 14, 2025

**Industry Class**: Prefabricated Commercial and Industrial Buildings and Structures (UNSPSC Code: 95141700)

**Government Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services PSPC
**Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**End-User Entity**: Department of Natural Resources (NRCan)
**Address**: 580 Booth Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E4, Canada

**Contact Information**:
Nicole Zimmerling (she/her)
nicole.zimmerling@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Disclaimer: The contact information is intended to be used for the purposes of this inquiry only and should not be used for any other purpose.

**South-of-the-Radar Information**: The project has been evaluated under the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, and North American Free Trade Agreement.

You can find the full request for proposal on the [Ariba Procurement Platform link](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18747237?extsite=MTg3NDcyMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==). 

Good luck!
